preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from cvterm where cvterm_id = 1812;

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO cvterm (cvterm_id, cv_id, name, definition, dbxref_id, is_obsolete, is_relationshiptype) VALUES (1812, 1041, 'Observation Unit','Variables used to enumerate the observation units' ,null, 0,0);
